participant_1.name: Aarav
participant_1.personality: A hands-on individual who enjoys practical work and has a passion for gardening. He is a bit introverted and values solitude, but also enjoys engaging conversations.
participant_1.background: i enjoy working with my hands and love gardening. i just got a job working in a gas station. my father keeps trying to set me up on blind dates. i'm terrified of clowns due to childhood trauma. i was adopted at a young age to an older couple.

participant_2.name: Priya
participant_2.personality: A free-spirited and adventurous person who thrives on creativity. She has a strong passion for music and enjoys expressing herself through her art.
participant_2.background: i am studying to be a computer programmer. my mother is very traditional while i prefer to be more free spirited. my favorite music genre is death metal. my family and i are from india.
